cast.name: 斯韦托扎尔·茨韦特科维奇 Svetozar Cvetkovic
伊祖丁·巴伊罗维奇 Izudin Bajrovic
瓦希德·赞科维奇 Vahid Dzankovic
鲍里斯·伊萨科维奇 Boris Isaković
米利卡·詹尼夫斯基 Milica Janevski

writer.name: 博洋·维勒蒂奇 Bojan Vuletic

director.name: 博洋·维勒蒂奇 Bojan Vuletic

introduction: On the evening of 30 July 1993, brothers Ivan and Stojan arrive at their uncle’s flat. Not far away, a tragic clash took place just moments earlier. It continues in the local detention unit. A parallel story explores the relationship between Ivan and his serious and rational father, Nikola. The two stories expand and become increasingly complex to shed light on the exciting life of one of Yugoslavia’s biggest acting starts, but also on the dark secrets of the 1990s – the nation's corrupt judiciary and imprisoned low lifers.
